There's no denying that many domestic animals live a life of luxury.
The newest luxury item geared towards kitties is wine.
A Japanese company has recently manufactured a beverage specifically for felines.
The pet food and supplement maker B&H Lifes...
...is responsible for the wine which they call Nyan Nyan Nouveau.
The drink does not contain any alcohol...
...but it's loaded with vitamins along with juice from Cabernet Franc wine grapes.
The unveiling of the wine came after the company decided to develop a drink...
...so pet owners could include their furry friends at Christmas and family celebrations.
